bow: my cousin is having her first baby soon moms what is something you would have loved to be gifted after you had baby want to get her something for herself so my cousin and her husband are expecting their first baby soon our very large family is over the moon excited because it is the first great grandchild to be born she has not had her baby shower yet in about month but everyone in our family has been showering them with gifts clothes etc for the baby since they told us all so while ll be getting stuff off her registry for the baby for her shower want to get her something that specifically for her not mom but can only imagine the physical mental and emotional exhaustion that comes with giving birth so maybe mani pedi gift card comfy and cute pjs what was something you moms would have loved to get for yourself after you had baby thanks mommit **tl dr** yayyy babies nursing pjs are nice also really loved having my own hospital gown search gownie on amazon mani pedi is tough after baby bc it hard to get out if the house for while especially for breastfeeding mom have gift certificate myself that doubting ll have the time to use for quite few months if you really want to score brownie points go clean her house we have had so many visitors and while that is nice it tough keeping the house clean my floors are filthy and my laundry is piling up totally take someone up on the offer to vacuum and mop my floors also love those friends who bring us dinner that simply needs to be reheated massage was my favorite thing mani pedi was my second favorite thing the above suggestions sound nice too nice pillow the sleep you do get is highly needed also purchased my breast friend its the best pillow for breast feeding out there but the most important thing got myself after baby was new dress that made me feel beautiful again so gift card to clothing store that nice is amazing tell her good luck and take it one day at time food ca stress this enough bring easy to prepare meals we got spaghetti and ate that for days then someone else bright casserole and it was the only thing that kept me sane the sleepless stressful environment not having to cook is the best gift my friend could give maid to come maybe once week or every other week after baby is born that first month or two maids can cost about 60 for couple of hours nursing tops or bras but those should be gotten after milk has come in otherwise something that is in her interests would have loved postnatal massage had few prenatal ones and the therapist does home visits for new moms but we could quite afford it my favorite gift was when people came over to help me get adult interaction plus help with the girls sometimes just sit and talk and we each cuddle baby or sometimes take nap while they fed the babies and put them down for nap and then cleaned for me also food like the mani pedi idea it hard to do after the baby is here but it is really nice to do couple of weeks before your due date my sister bought be gift card to buy new bras which thought was awesome also had friend that bought me one of those little diaper wet bags but then filled it with stuff like lotion lipgloss and body wash for me personally did really want people doing lot of the chores for me after because too picky about how things are done think most people would love it though food is awesome did really have the time or energy to cook so freezer meals were great gift certificates for take out would also be good deleted food cleaning service really good black out blindfold noise machine pedicures were the best short time to paper myself and have some alone time would have really loved some beautiful pj pants and slippers that pretty much all she going to be wearing for weeks on end anyway massage food delivery nice sleeping mask so she can catch few zs even during the day nursing pjs or quality nursing bra those can get expensive and the cheapy ones got for myself only barely did the job get her crockpot with note attached that tells her to return the crockpot to you so that you can bring it to her the week she comes home filled with crock pot beef stew http www butterwithasideofbread com 2013 01 the best crockpot beef stew html or whatever dish you choose the two gestures remember the most fondly after my son was born are the pot roast my cousin brought me and the chicken casserole my mother in law brought deleted an hour to sleep give her coupon book of favors she can call and you ll hold the baby for while deleted belly bandit had one but it got too big and just could fork over another 60 for the next size down it worked really well and would have loved to have another have no experience with other pillows bought my my breast friend from craig list liked it because you buckle it on and it is sloped so the babies head is supported it even has slight pillow for the baby there was pocket on the outside of it which allowed for me to store remote or cell phone could stand up with the pillow strapped on and have one hand on the baby able to move about the room its worth the investment for sure food come over and visit ask what you can do around the house or offer to watch the baby so she can take shower or nap epsom bath salt for an awesome bath on your way over call and say you re running into the store first and ask if she needs anything mean it food and post partum doula loungewear as comfy as pajamas and as presentable as street clothes you re dressed but more comfortable great for the shape of your changing body and you could still use them as pajamas and sleep in them wo tell you must nap when the baby naps especially in the beginning it the law swear bonus points if the top nursing top postnatal doula one of my good friend mom gifted me burt bees gift set pretty large one that had bunch of goodies in it liked it lot because it generally not something would buy myself though love their products the gift sets are just pricy it came with nice lotion belly butter body oil things like that of course am still pregnant so do know if there are more useful things for post partum but use the stuff now and will continue to use pp sure someone gave me some lavender lotion it was great because it helped keep me and the kid soothed and calm agree something comfortable but presentable robe and nursing tank top would be nice too finnish baby box read up on it would that be the same as korean style postpartum care facility they re pretty standard here in south korea and everyone spoke to while my wife spent her first two weeks as mother thought the idea of it was spectacular like summercamp for new mothers the romanized name is sanhujoriwon they re awesome agree my son is months old and would still love this casseroles those little loaf pans that are good size for people or larger casseroles if she has additional family members living there often there helping out coupons for baby watching baby sitting or household chores remember everyone wants to hold the baby including mom but nobody wants to fold the laundry including mom someone to clean the house and restaurant gift certificates stuff she can put next to the bed chair while breast feeding something fun to drink water from some moisturizing lotion or chapstick book etc sooo true meals were the best gift after being home with baby if not meals then gift cards to local places that deliver or someone can pick it up quick jj cole has nice apostrophe shaped pillow that found way easier to use than an shape still have had massage since having my baby and he now 18 months old and pregnant again when was postpartum would ve given anything for someone to take me to massage therapist and hold the baby while got to lay on my stomach and get worked on it would have been the best thing in the history of ever moby million wipes extra diapers in the next size up company mostly for me really good healthy snacks also some pre made meals if you are in the area maybe some gift cards to healthy ish restaurants that deliver baby care is really an around the clock deal for the first few weeks and would have loved to have had some yummy snacks all portioned out for me and maybe some extra water bottles meal planning was by far the most daunting task for me and would have loved to have some healthy meals already done and in the freezer or maybe some gift cards to nearby restaurants that delivered snacks not just hot food though that great too but things that she can eat one handed when nursing little bags of trail mix peanut butter crackers cheese sticks apple slices peeled and sectioned clementines also water gets really boring after while sparking flavored water or iced tea or crystal light packets if she likes those really break up the monotony bunch of my friends and coworkers cooked and delivered hot meal to us everyday for week after delivery it was amazing not having to worry about food made things so much easier getting teary just thinking about it http www takethemameal com blog top 13 meal ministry meals php deleted agree with the massage mani and pedi second this still remember people bringing us dinner it was the sweetest gift it is so insane those first two weeks would say food and gift card to the nearest convenience pharmacy for all if the items they are bound to realize they need edit should clarify the sweetest gift in the beginning for me was time do what you can to make life little bit easier for her you definitely have to get one after you have this baby pamper yourself start saving up now if you have to because think that would be the best thing ever after you give birth would have killed for massage after gave birth too was so darn sore and stressed out oh well there is always next time between him spending weeks in the nicu he was 34 weeker my husband flying to va to take the bar then my new little family moving across the country at 5w pp it just never happened also big proponent of myofascial massage therapy and am hoping can find qualified practitioner in our current city give her coupon for day out for her with babysitting from you included massage mani pedi and facial stay close with baby so she can nurse something else totally loved was my kindle my husband gave me it just few weeks after our son was born and it saved me from boredom while baby cluster fed my mil got me an id bracelet with anton mom engraved on it that my so name it was awesome amp very thoughtful when my sister had her baby put together gift basket full of cool stuff from lush mostly bath bombs and bubble bars then offered to babysit when she needs night to herself that way know she ll have time to take advantage of the comfy bath stuff think watched every episode of csi when was nursing my daughter second the netflix subscription suggestion really sweet friend of mine gave me couple of choices for what she would make me she asked what would prefer which was awesome because did have to come up with ideas myself our freezer was stocked with lasagna and was so excited for something different another tip give food in disposable aluminum pans it so nice not to worry about clean up massage house call house cleaner food literally no time for mani pedi in the first few months saw maid suggestion that absolutely genius another thing if you re close to her buy her some ice packs for her lady parts incision that shit smarts and the ones from the hospital only last so long wow thats lot to go through in such short period of time hope this baby keeps cooking until your due date and you get some time to relax afterward my best friend gave me gift certificates to restaurants that deliver when my lo was born the first night home takeout was that much better because was coming off hospital food things like magazines and app store gift cards would be nice too as she can use her phone or read while she feeding found that everyone who gifted specifically for me except my best friend gave me lotion so would avoid that cleaning service or you coming to clean but that may make her feel weird yes yes yes one of the first visitors to our house brought rotisserie chicken from the grocery store while everyone was cooing over the baby was alone in the kitchen ripping it apart heaven oh my god massage would kill for one it like every muscle and bone in your body do lay right after childbirth came here to say this food definitely easy to make eat meals or just make food and bring it help around the house nap dinners anything that can help her have some time to herself after all she gone through it was huge help when my parents came over during the day for the first week and helped me get my self together to figure out how to take care of baby big clarification here **if you re going to come over to help actually help ** had tons of visitors that did the oh ll come over and help you with the baby song and dance which in reality turned into me frantically cleaning up the house while they sat on the couch holding my son only when he was calm the second he so much as whined he was being held out for me to take him back so if you offer help make sure it *help* and not help if you re sitting on the couch and mom is doing anything but resting or relaxing you re not *helping* you re visiting if you do wind up visiting know when to leave having guests over just adds to my stress level ca tell you how grateful am when my mil comes over once in while after ve worked graveyard to watch my son for few hours she ll come over at take him and tell me to go to bed wo hear peep from either of them until noon and my god sleep like *rock* ll wake up and she done my dishes and moved some laundry around and my son is happy as clam do ask her to do any of the cleaning or anything she just does it automatically because she knows we get swamped and she been there did the same thing for her when she did chemo it makes huge difference even if it just couple little chores living in messy house stresses people out and you can easily be overwhelmed by everyday tasks so yes say above all else genuine help is the best people can usually acquire things like robes and pjs over time but *stuff* wo fold laundry wash dishes or mop the floors babies are exhausting and if baby turns out to be very attention hungry she might not have the time or energy to get things done mine no joke has screaming meltdown if he even *sees* vacuum or mop no it not the kind of gift you can just buy put in box and say here you go but the impact in my opinion is much deeper thanks unfortunately we re moving again this fall so no relaxation in my near future but with any luck the first part of your comment should be do able copy of the happiest baby on the block she may need it she may not either way that book has saved my sanity and had to have nervous breakdown in my gynecologist office at my postpartum check up before anyone even told me about the book pay for cleaning service to come tired new parents have no time to clean and are told not to but messy house usually adds to stress you are so right about this my husband went out of town for weekend when our baby was weeks and friend came over to help she got there as the baby had just finished the biggest projectile vomit ever seen and was frantically calling the nurse line to ask how much vomit constitutes medical emergency there was vomit on the baby vomit on me vomit on the floor vomit pooling in the rock play and my friend walks in hiiiii you did answer the door so let myself in could have cried you ca really ask someone else to clean up puke but man could have used help cleaning up that puke contact info for le leche league or some free lactation consults someone to help support bfing sleep and bra that fit for me it was svu
